name: Virtual Art Gallery
description: Desktop based application for emerging artists to showcase their artworks.

name: Travel and Tourism
description: A desktop based application for hotel booking.

name: Payment Gateway
description: A payment gateway system with animations using a credit card interface.

name: Glassmorphic Calculator/Converter
description: A basic calculator and currency converter with a glassmorphic translucent design.

name: Flip Card Game
description: A memory-style flip card game with a fun, interactive user interface built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

name: LANtern Messenger
description: A peer-to-peer messaging application enabling direct, serverless communication over local networks. Built with React, Vite, PeerJS, and Tailwind CSS, it supports real-time messaging, file sharing, and robust reconnection logic.

name: iTODO-TASK MANAGER
description: A simple yet powerful todo list application built with React to help you manage your tasks and boost productivity.
